question.text: Please indicate your gender:
Have you had diabetes during a pregnancy?
Please enter your birthdate:
Please indicate your height:
Additional inches in height:
Please indicate your weight:
Please indicate your Race/Ethnic background (Check all that apply):
Please indicate your family history. Check any who have or have had diabetes.
Do you know your latest blood pressure reading?
Please enter your latest blood pressure systolic reading?
Please enter your diastolic reading?
Do you know your total cholesterol level?
What is you total Cholesterol level?
Do you know your low-density lipoprotein (LDL) level?
What is your low-density lipoprotein (LDL) level?
Do you know your high-density lipoprotein (HDL) level?
What is you high-density lipoprotein (HDL) level?
Do you know your triglycerides (fasting) level??
What is your triglycerides (fasting) level?
Do you know the level of glucose (sugar) in your blood?
Please indicate the level of glucose (sugar) in your blood:
Do you know the result of your last glucose tolerance test?
What was the result of you last glucose tolerance test?
Blurred vision
Urinary tract infection or yeast infection
Dry, itchy skin
Numbness or tingling in your arms or legs
Frequent need to urinate
Frequent thirst
Weight loss for no reason
Has your doctor ever told you that you have heart disease or artery disease?

xform:submission.xform:message: The form that you are working on either has incomplete questions or invalid data. This means that you have either not completed all mandatory questions or have entered invalid data into the form. Please recheck the form and make necessary changes before moving on. Please keep in mind that many of the text fields have restrictions. Read the question carefully to make sure you are aware of these restrictions.
